| Splenisu Cervicis | Nuchal lig; C7-T3 SP @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 | 2-4th ribs (sup border) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 | spinal nn. T2-T5 (Ant ramus) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 | Elevates ribs @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 |

: Splenius Cervicis OIAN {.striped .hover}

## Origin
T3-T6 or T7 (SP) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Insertion
C1-C3/C4 TP @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation
spinal nn. C1-C6 (Post rami, lateral branches) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action

- **Bilateral:** Extends C/S and head @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
- **Unilateral:** I/L head SB and Rotation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Muscle groups
Splenius cervicis is part of the [Superficial intrinsic back muscle group]({{< var ref-oians >}})
